abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Sustainable Tourism
            Development Project for Montenegro (MSTDP) is to assist the
            Republic of Montenegro to better design and implement and
            integrated coastal zone management approach aimed at
            reducing coastal degradation and at the same time fostering
            environmentally sound high quality tourism development. This
            environmental impact assessment (EIA) evaluated
            environmental risks associated with the project and
            recommends measures to mitigation them. In this regard
            mitigation measures include : ensure proper applicability of
            the Republic of Montenegro existing laws and regulations
            related to the protection of the environment, and the Bank
            's operational policy on the protection of the
            environment; exert constant pre-treatment monitoring and
            constant water quality parameters during and after water
            treatment; to avoid dust, exhaust gases and noise, modern
            machinery and periodic maintenance will be enforced during
            construction phase; to keep high levels of population
            health, some local water sources with questionable water
            quality will be disconnected from the water supply network
            after the RWSS completion; access roads to the construction
            site will be adequately maintained, and regularly sprayed
            with water to reduce propagation of dust; vehicles used for
            transport of materials will be covered and regularly washed
            to facilitate dust  prevention and cleaning; hunting and
            disturbance of wildlife will be avoided; all solid waste
            generated on the construction sites will be collected and
            disposed at the appropriate city landfill; wood, paper,
            glass, and plastic containers will be properly collected,
            separated, stored and disposed at the sanitary landfill on
            Podgorica; excess excavation material (soil) will be
            transported and disposed to the local construction material
            landfill; and finally; health and safety of construction
            workers will be enforced through provision of adequate
            equipment and training on environmental best practices.
